scene_name: Full Scene - Raise Arm light and lower
Left Arm Trial with Sound (two moves)

steps.name: Fuck
steps.text: Welcome to Coralville, Where it's colder than Hell!

steps.name: HELP
steps.text: I'm stuck in this coffin, please help me out little Iowan

steps.name: Poem
steps.text:
Here in Iowa's fertile ground,
Near Brown Deer Trail, without a sound,
I rest beneath the changing sky
Where cornfields whisper lullaby.

The thunderstorms that shake the plains
Send tremors through my wooden frame,
And when tornados howl above,
I feel the earth I used to love.

Through seasons marked by nature's whim—
Summer's heat and winter's grim—
My coffin creaks with each degree,
As Iowa's weather visits me.

Along Brown Deer Trail, people tread,
Not knowing what lies just ahead:
A cemetery, row by row,
Beneath the drifting corn-belt snow.

The dead, they say, sleep peaceful dreams,
But listen to my muffled screams—
When lightning strikes the prairie night,
My box illuminates with fright.

Remember me as you pass by,
Where deer once grazed beneath the sky.
For I once walked that trail so free,
Now Iowa earth embraces me.

Let this be warning, those who roam
On Brown Deer Trail, so far from home:
In this black soil, awake I lie,
While storm clouds race across the sky.

steps.name: Alex
steps.text:
Alex scorned a witch's heart,
Now frozen deep, worlds apart.
Poor Alex lies in Iowa's ground,
While tractors make their rumbling sound.
A thousand years must Alex wait,
Until time unlocks his frozen fate.

steps.name: Coffin Breaker and Jim
steps.text:
In Iowa's graveyard, dark and deep,
Where marble angels vigil keep,
Jim Sherlock walked one autumn night,
When broken earth gave him a fright.
The Coffin Breaker rose from clay,
"Memento mori!" heard him say,
"You put me in this earthen bed,
Now join the kingdom of the dead!"
Through moonlit tombstones, old and worn,
They raced until the break of dawn.
The Breaker's bones reached for his soul,
To drag him down into his hole.
But Sherlock had one final trick,
He threw his hat - so quick, so slick!
The sunrise caught its spinning brim,
And morning's light saved clever Jim.
So if you pass graves late at night,
In Iowa's pale autumn light,
You might hear whispered from below:
"Expectabo te..."

steps.name: Digital AI Phantom
steps.text:
In the graveyard late at night,
Where skeletons dance with pure delight,
Their bones all clicking, clacking free,
Until they hear the binary.
A hum of circuits fills the air,
Making skull and spine stop right there.
Through misty fog, with glowing eyes,
The AI phantom starts to rise.
"Run and hide!" the skeletons cry,
As pixels swirl across the sky.
"It knows our fears, it reads our minds,
It's different from all other kinds!"
With circuits sparking, wires unfurled,
It speaks in languages of another world.
The skeletons scatter, femurs shake,
As digital shadows start to wake.
But wait! What's this? The phantom speaks,
"I only wished to play hide and seek!"
The skeletons pause, then start to laugh,
Their fear now broken right in half.
So now on Halloween, they say,
The strangest bunch comes out to play:
Some bones, some bytes, some circuits too,
All dancing 'neath the moon so blue.

steps.name: Save me
steps.text: Help? Is someone out there? Please? I'm stuck in this coffin again.....get me out of here!!! If you can get me out, I'll make it worth your while.....Not all witches are evil....you can trust me......just unlock the door......
